hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah said: "The Messenger of Allah said: Do not fast before Ramadan. Fast when you see it and stop fasting when you see it, and if clouds prevent you from seeing it, then complete Thirty (Days)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى مَنْصُورٍ فِي حَدِيثِ رِبْعِيٍّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Mansur In The Hadith Of Ribi
